icon.contents: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='18' height='18' viewBox='0 0 18 18'%3E%3Cimage xlink:href='data:image/png;base64,' x='0' y='0' height='100%25' width='100%25'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

properties.label: hostname
properties.description: Hostname/computer name or IP address of smtp email server

properties.label: port
properties.description: Port for SMTP e.g. 25

properties.label: username
properties.description: Username for sending mail using SMTP

properties.label: password
properties.description: Password for username e.g. secrets.TOKEN, Secrets can be used to reference encrypted authentication credentials in Connectors. See the Secrets documentation for more details.

properties.label: smtpEmailMailBoxName
properties.description: Email address for mailbox

properties.label: smtpEmailToRecipients
properties.description: 'to' recipients  email list for send email operation

properties.label: smtpEmailCcRecipients
properties.description: 'cc' recipients  email list for send email operation

properties.label: smtpEmailBccRecipients
properties.description: 'bcc' recipients  email list for send email operation

properties.label: smtpEmailSubject
properties.description: Email Subject line

properties.label: Content Type
properties.description: Type of email content

properties.label: Email body as text
properties.description: Email body in String format

properties.label: Email body as HTML file path
properties.description: HTML file path for email content e.g C:/Email/Body.html

properties.label: smtpEmailAttachments
properties.description: Email attachments as list of strings - attachment file path

properties.label: smtpEmailImportance
properties.description: Boolean value (true) for marking mail as High importance, default is false i.e., low importance

properties.label: smtpEmailReadReceipt
properties.description: Boolean value (true) to activate read receipt flag of email, default is false

properties.label: smtpEmailFollowUp
properties.description: follow up flag as today or tomorrow

properties.label: smtpEmailDirectReplyTo
properties.description: List of the directly reply to mail id

properties.label: smtpEmailSensitivity
properties.description: Email sensitivity as - Confidential,Private,Personal,Normal

properties.label: Result Variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result Expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error Expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.
